column3: “• Smoking Curaleaf's thc-30.35% sativa beauty-bud, Super Snow Dawg, after its (& Curaleaf's) long absence from dispensary's shelves, and I'm happy it's back! After a mere two tokes off my bong, a wave of pure numbing-warmth flowed freely thru my mind & body.. precisely what i needed, when i needed it! 🔥• therefore & unfortunately, I must warn the newbies off this 5 ⭐️-strain, as you must reserve this psychoactive, c...”

“This is one of my favorite sativa strains. The taste and smell with blow you away. The high is crisp, clear, and long lasting 3-4 hours.  This is a Grade A Medical Cannabis Strain, that seems to be very hard to find. I'm a Medical Cannabis patient in both NJ and MI and I always pick up as much as I can when it is available, which is far a few between. I would highly recommend this strain to anyone looking for pain re...”

“Aroma: Skunk, Coffee, Earthy, sweet 


Taste: Pungent, Diesel, earthy, coffee, skunk 


Effect: Nearly instant euphoria, introspective, upbeat, you will fall in love. It starts out with a sensation in the upper cheek bones rather than the eyes, with a slight headband feeling accompanying, and then gradually transitions into an undescribable feeling behind your eyes that typically comes with a Haze. This strain brings...”

“The taste and effects of this medicine are out of this world. D+B Wellness in Bethel, CT is the place to get yours. Ask for Citron T93% Sativa Crunch on the menu and be prepared for a delicious concentrate that soothes the mind and stimulates at the same time. There's even a little pain relieving quality to be had.”
“This strain seems to be a very good for my PTSD. I could smoke this all day.”

“This is a perfect partner to your morning coffee. If you take it before bed, you'll be up at nite writing reviews about it. 

Don't let it fool you. It is a Sativa but it's not gonna motivate you to run a mile. It will however help you focus as well as enjoy the task at hand. Like a good dog.”

“If you suffer from anxiety and stress like I do then this strain is sure to help. its a great morning strain helped get the wheels turning and the creativity flowing. Has a really noticeable citrus taste that is sure to get the taste buds going. Great for crushing social anxiety a mist try.”

“Chemdawg as a sativa?!?! Snowdawg is a strain I was interested in trying for a while and it met expectations well. The bud was sage to light green with forest green calyxes, brown pistols, and sparkling trichomes. This bud was the opposite of dense, anti-dense if you will; So fluffy I'm gonna Die". The scent and taste of this flower was sweet/flowery and musky with some earthiness. Good cerebral high. the first few ...”"

“Got this from Oregrown in Bend, Oregon and I must say it not only looks and smells so yummy the taste was amazing and the way it took away the stress and pains was s 5 star rating well deserved. Going back for more today .”

“Tastes lemony, citrusey, with somewhat earthy and diesely aftertastes. Absolutely resin and trychromes EVERYWHERE.  Over 30% Ct Mmp here and Curaleaf's Citron is well worth the two three weeks I waited deciding, and having the funds because I always have to have an indica.  Although as commented on before it is wierd to have a hybrid and indica parents create a sativa? Can somebody help me understand? As I think that...”

“Great tasting pot that hits hard and fast, both in the head and body. However, I wouldn't recommend it for people suffering with anxiety issues. I have smoked pot several times a day for the past 14 years to relieve my anxiety. I smoked two one-hitter bowls and found it actually sent me into a anxiety  attack. That's the first time smoking pot has ever triggered an attack instead of relax me. It was a great high stil...”

“Incredible. My favorite sativa so far. Makes me real thirsty and a little hungry. High lasts a decent amount of time too. Great for day time anything. Has a great citrusy pungent smell, fluffy when fresh, lots of crystals. Also known as G6 in the medicinal community in NJ.”
“Very nice sativa, citrus flavor is nice also great for daytime use”

“☀️ ¡good morning, sunshine! ☀️ 

This is an excellent choice as daytime strain-favorite when one needs to have energy, be creative + productive, with a smile on your face bc pain is managed + anxiety's by the wayside.

I'm presently water-bonging T 21% Super Snow Dog (cultivated by Curaleaf in Simsbury CT) and, while taste is vaguely-citrusy, it's more woods-y – both is flavor and physicality. Not impressed with trim...”

“I was quite interested and curious to try this one– as I LOVE to try the flower-form of my favorite oils, and vice versa. While I smoked a joint of this G6 only 10 mins ago, I normally have full onset of effects by now.. and the results are ..well, ..NOT-abysmal (lol), as well as NOT what I expected from this T25 flower. My back pain began at a 7 and is prob at 6 now, presently 15 mins after intake. And while I'm con...”

“I used this CT medical strain as a vape cartridge called Citron. The effects are extreme elevation like flying a jet in the stratosphere with auto pilot enabled.  A very cerbral effect that remains exremely manageable throughout the 2 -4 effective duration.  Good for alleviating depression and/deceased motivation and energy.”
“Super easy to smoke, very yummy and goes fast. Nice clean high, easy to come down”

“One of the best daytime strains!  Doesn't take a lot to get me in a great mental place.  When my pain and discomfort is at a high level I grind up some ACDC (high CBD) and mix 2/3 SSD, with 1/3 ACDC, nice CBD kick to help with the pain.”

“I was quite interested and curious to try this one– as I LOVE to try the flower-form of my favorite oils, and vice versa. While I smoked a joint of this G6 only 10 mins ago, I normally have full onset of effects by now.. and the results are ..well, ..NOT-abysmal (lol), as well as NOT what I expected from this T25 flower. My back pain began at a 7 and is prob at 6 now, presently 15 mins after intake. And while I'm con...”

“I have to go against the grain on this one - first strain ever that I could not finish a chamber (vaporizer) of, and I'm not very picky. Anxiety is one reason I come to cannabis and this stuff just makes it worse for me. They can't all be winners for everyone.”
“strong fun head high. smooth taste”

“For me this is pretty powerful stuff. Gives me a lot of energy. Only negative effect I have had is if I wasn't  doing something and/or keeping my mind busy it would race a little. You get hungry when you start coming down and relaxed. Excellent for pain relief! Definitely a day time strain.”
“Very creative high. Good high for doing homework. Flavor is kind of figgy. Potent body high in large doses.”
“Amazing strain if done correctly knocks you off your ass and everything around you disappears lol great relaxation and pain relief”
“This new, favorite oil cartridge (•T224!) is a great sativa —it's inspiring euphoria sparks my creativity, energy + drive on an other-wise-perfect couch day!•☀️☮🦄• •👍🏽👍🏽•”
“An all time favorite, very good strain”

“Very pleasant aroma.  Hits you like a freight train the first time.  Lots of energy, might make it a little hard to focus for those who have problems with that with sativa strains (my wife does sometimes).  
Pep restporative, decent head high, nothing too overwhelming.  When you *need* to get shit done, here you go.”
“Yes it does feel very sativa-dominant. Hits fast and hard. I felt very creative and funny.  An a+ strain.”
“awesome strain in the beginning the buzz was a little bit heavy but in 10 or 15 mins it really evens out and makes you inspired. also it has a grapefruit kind if smell to it”

“SSD takes the crown for the most delicious tasting bud I've ever tried. I always make sure I purchase only top-shelf flowers and this one earns its place with the rest. It's a fantastic high that keeps you focused, enthusiastic, up for anything for anything. Listen to some really great music, roll a joint and smoke a few bowls cuz SSD is the password to a good time.”
“Had a very light and citrusy taste, and yielded a heady and uplifting high perfect for completing tasks during the day.”
“great high, starts off easy then sneaks up.once it hits, grab a couch.”
“Had a very light and citrusy taste, and yielded a heady and uplifting high perfect for completing tasks during the day.”
“This is a get shit done strain. Smoke a bowl and clean the house type of thing. It's very nice when I'm feeling lazy. All I have to do is smoke a bowl and im good”
“Yes it does feel very sativa-dominant. Hits fast and hard. I felt very creative and funny.  An a+ strain.”
“great high, starts off easy then sneaks up.once it hits, grab a couch.”
“Super potent sativa! Straight to the dome. Flavor and smell is on point!”
“awesome strain in the beginning the buzz was a little bit heavy but in 10 or 15 mins it really evens out and makes you inspired. also it has a grapefruit kind if smell to it”

“SSD takes the crown for the most delicious tasting bud I've ever tried. I always make sure I purchase only top-shelf flowers and this one earns its place with the rest. It's a fantastic high that keeps you focused, enthusiastic, up for anything for anything. Listen to some really great music, roll a joint and smoke a few bowls cuz SSD is the password to a good time.”

“Awesome stuff, just cracked my top 3 after smoking it a few times. Hard hitting and long lasting this strain will put you in a nice place for hours. Good strain for chilling so if want to partake in a movie or ballgame in a nice relaxed state this is a good one for that. You can get chatty and giggly though if friends are around. Highly recommend this to anyone!”

“Got some from Greenleaf Compassion Center, in Montclair N.J. 18.77% T.H.C.A. Very good quality, & excellent taste. The description of effects as described is spot on for me, at least. Goes well with Blueberry Kush for nighttime.”

“Great Smelling, nice bag appeal and taste pretty decent.  I tried at close to 25pct thc.  I got a pretty intense heady high for 30 minutes that didn't help me with pain, nausea or anxiety.  Medicinal effects were quick to fade away.  Tried it twice, won't buy again.  I know a lot of people who love this strain, so don't let me talk you out of trying.  I would just start out with Prj or 8th.”
“Amazing”

“I know this strain as G6 and I ate it in a grape hybrid gummy from Homewood Windy City dispensary. It made me Anxious, paranoid (noises were amplified, thought I would see stuff out of the corner of my eye), but good for appetite increase. I ate it at night to work on a grad school application and smoked gorilla glue flower while on it to combat the frigid 18 degrees here in Chicago.”

“I loved this strain it's very smooth and tasty it gives you a really focused high if you have any business to take care of or you have something you need to get accomplished this is a great sativa to smoke”
“a very nice uplifting High with some subtle sleepy notes but that is passed by with a real wave of energetic Buzz”

“I get this strain regularly. It’s a smooth high. I feel as though I’m in a dimly lit café...and there’s a warm acoustic group playing some beautiful jazz music and filling the room with positivity and fuzz. #wouldrecommend”
“Very good taste and packs a punch,”
“wonderful energetic high”
“fresh and uplifting great butter yet vape at night to sleep”

“Great Strain, has a nice citrus and lemoney smell to it. I highly recommended. Got a half 0z from a michigan dealer who grows his all organic with THC 28 +. The strain is really good and gives you a nice head and super clean body high. Definitely would recommend this!”
“I can get so much done both physically and mentally. If I'm tired or in pain this is my daytime choice.”
“Very smooth smoke great taste and strong head change”
“I strongly prefer a GREAT SATIVA STRAIN and this one doesn't let'cha down, at allllllllll...I enjoy being motivated, focused, creative, you name it and this does it for me! 👌👍”
“one of my new personal favorites. beautiful buds, amazing smell and taste, with a captivating high.”
“Just picked up some Budder at 76%  I must say I was pleasantly surprised. Very heady but slowly comes over the body. Looking forward to picking up some more”
“the best strain I've had”
“Aka Citron At my dispensary. Definitely does the trick if you want some uplifting good mood and not overly with the munchies”
“relaxing, mellowing, yet clear headed”
“wonderful energetic high beautiful bud tons or orange hairs”
“this strain is my all time favorite. makes me feel straight up GOOD!”

“Super Snow Dog is a sativa-dominant strain from the Chemdawg family. This fast-flowering strain has a sweet fruity and citrus aroma, and patients typically choose Super Snow Dog for daytime relief of stress and tension.”
“Very euphoric and that good feeling you only get from certain sativas in your eyes and face. Feels like a massage for your muscles lol.”
“Love it...love it...It is popular on the East Coast but I haven't seen in dispensary yet. Clone only and this plant is great. Relaxing and social. Reveg's beautifully for a monster crop of a plant.”
“relaxing”
“Pretty heavy high - physical effects are really apparent. Good high, but knocked me out!”

“Very enjoyable mellow buzz with a nice energy kick that allows you to do a lot of things. Just did a few rips and then repaired a loose battery terminal in my car, swept out my car port from all the sand, leaves, and salt that accumulated over the winter and finished up by vacuuming the house. Productive day done with a nice buzz on, can't beat that. Highly recommend this herb.”

“Nice body high, all tingly and heavy legs. I tried watching Doctor Who while high and following the plot was a little tough, my mind kept wandering to new ideas. Looks like the creative characteristics were spot on.”
“very flavorful. pack with beautiful flower and citrus flavors. helps great with pain phantom pain PTSD anxiety and depression. I think it may be my new favorite.”
“Very nice Sativa!”
“Phenomenal. Strong & heady”
“I’m stoned”
“First time trying, super tasty, great stone. Would definitely try again. 26.1% thc 😉”
“Fantastic strain. Smells like citrus and fuel w/ some funkyness. Powerful sativa effects that leave you feeling excellent and focused. A nice smooth strain. Effects are definitely sativa dominant.”
“Very uplifting strain. I got mine from Magnolia Road CC in Boulder, CO and it was a Super Silver Haze x Chemdog cross. I get a mostly sweet yet earthy and pungent smell off it.”

“This strain has become my favorite since I first discovered it at my local dispensary. It has a crisp citrus smell and taste. A couple hits is all that's needed to blow the top of your head off to allow your brain to expand to cerebral heights. Please note that this product, which I get in the T26-T31 range is not for the faint of heart. The unwary may find themselves hiding under their bed if they smoke too much.”

“Super Snow Dog is a sativa-dominant strain from the Chemdawg family. This fast-flowering strain has a sweet fruity and citrus aroma, and patients typically choose Super Snow Dog for daytime relief of stress and tension.”

“Mild sativa. Mix of head/body high. No anxious feeling at all. Nice for relaxing at night while watching a movie. Can be used for day time to increase focus or stay on task. 
(Amount/.5g -bubbler)”
“Great daytime smoke uplifting and tastes good. Used often or in a large amount its a little spacey but really worth a try.”
“I am an anxious person so some strains are not for me, this one made me feel a bit anxious but might be perfect for someone else!”

“Had this in the terp sauce and the terps are 13+ and 11+ of them in Myrcs. Very tasty and smooth on the draw. Tunnel vision is sometimes a side effect. I just stare at something, tv...  felt very relaxed. Couch locked to say the least. One a side note is was fresh out of the fridge. Second draw of released smoke, inhaled through nostrils produced  a very fresh experience.”

“Love .. Love .. Love. I run to my one hitter big bong and clean my stem. The taste is so citrusy yummy .. I get this medi curaleaf in CT .. soil grown .. So it has a better consistency to break it up .. Never had it hydro so I wonder. Great cerbral .. happy productive high. My PTSD always gets me with a sativas (benefits over negatives) .. Making me a bit anxious but this one isn't too bad!!”
“Tried some of this the other day from a friends Tilray order, tried to like it, didn't.”
“Excellent anxiety and stress reliever that helps you to focus and actually increases your creativity.”
“I don't usually smoke weed, but when I do it's super snow dawg. :))”
